Jeric Mariano

Past

I grew up in a Filipino household in San Diego my whole life. I've lived in National City for as long as I can remember. I went to Bethune K-8 from kindergarten to 8th grade. Then, I graduated Morse High School.

Present

Currently, I am now attending Southwestern College to gain experience and obtain a degree or some certificates for Web Design & Development. I was a Computer Science Major, but I've recently switched because of my dislike for math. I've also thought that Web Design felt more for me.

Future

My plan is to build a great E-portfolio with an extensive showcase of amazing websites and projects as well as to get my associate's degree in Web Design & Development. I am currently working on that E-portfolio right now and am trying to strengthen my coding skills. Ideally, I would like to get a job as soon as possible, but if not, I plan on continuing school and getting a bachelor's degree to help me in my applications.

My Plan For Success

  1. Strengthen my coding skills
  2. Finish Frontend Simplified
  3. Create a very good E-portfolio
  4. Obtain my associates degree
  5. Continue to pursue a bachelor's degree until I land a job

You shouldn't memorize all the elements or even certain concepts. Even great developers use Google!
